description: Wasteland is proud to present “Into The Mist” a BDSM themed soap opera with a supernatural twist. In the first episode of this nine-part series, young Chloe (Veronika Raquel) and Melissa (Jenny Hendrix) have been hired as domestic staff at a mysterious estate on Rutherford Island. Shortly after arriving, they feel something is “not quite right around her” after witnessing the dark mistress, Victoria (Lezley Zen) severely punish houseboy Willy (Jonny Ace). Things become even more disturbing as night falls, but a storm has washed out the bridge to the island, making escape impossible. Originally aired on PinkTV (European Cable) in 2005 (Episode 1 of 9)
title: Into the Mist - Episode 1: The Arrival
